github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.value: Always start a commit with (feature), (fix), (docs), (style), (refactor), (perf), (test), (chore) or (ci) to indicate the type of change. For example: (feature) ... commit message. Use the most filename with most changes and make it more natural e.g. (feature - livestream) Added HD viewing or (bug - settings) This is a fix..
